Message:
everyone’s wallets went missing
while they were out.

Theft this time, huh...?
This unit has completely rotten.

Then a rumor spread,
claiming that
the culprit was...me.

I was on suspension and
wanted revenge, they said...

Unlike them,
I’ve lived my life diligently.

So if they have time to talk,
they have time to search.
I’m sure the wallets are as
good as gone by now, though.
